machine.description: The machine type, e.g. 'i386'. An empty string if the value cannot be determined.

processor.description: The (real) processor name, e.g. 'amdk6'. An empty string if the value cannot be determined.

platform.description: Returns a single string identifying the underlying platform with as much useful information as possible. The output is intended to be human readable rather than machine parseable.

system.description: The system/OS name, such as 'Linux', 'Darwin', 'Java', 'Windows'. An empty string if the value cannot be determined.

release.description: The systemâ€™s release, e.g. '2.2.0' or 'NT'. An empty string if the value cannot be determined.

EGPOps/s.description: An Erasmus GP specific performance metric directly proportional to the prcoessing power of the system for typical Erasmus GP tasks in units of notional operations per second. Bigger = faster.

created.description: The date and time of the first use of this platform.
